description: Delivered custom full-stack web solutions using PHP, Drupal, and Laravel, collaborating closely with clients, integrating APIs, optimizing performance, and providing ongoing maintenance and technical support.
Maintained and enhanced sites based on evolving needs, built reusable Drupal/Laravel components, and supported migration from Drupal 7 to Drupal 8.
Maintained and enhanced sites based on evolving needs, built reusable Drupal/Laravel components, and supported migration from Drupal 7 to Drupal 8.
Developed and maintained cross-browser compatible Drupal 7/8 websites, implemented new features, and collaborated with remote teams to deliver e-commerce, social media, and corporate platforms.
